DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety profile alfimeprase assess monitoring adverse event , serious adverse event major bleed event 120 minute follow instillation study drug occlude central venous access device .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Alfimeprase Subjects With Occluded Catheters
DOC.criteria: Must give write informed consent Ages 18 older Unable withdraw least 3 mL blood central venous access device Hemodynamically stable Available followup assessment Inability infuse least 2 mL saline catheter Catheter place less 48 hour prior detection occlusion Catheter use hemodialysis pheresis Previous treatment plasminogen activator current episode catheter occlusion Less 18 year age Any evidence mechanical nonthrombotic occlusion In opinion investigator , subject `` high risk '' bleed event embolic complication , condition bleed constitutes significant hazard Increased risk drug extravasation Pregnant , lactating , actively menstruate woman woman childbearing potential use adequate contraceptive precaution ( e.g. , intrauterine device , oral contraceptive , barrier method , contraception deem adequate investigator ) Known righttoleft cardiac shunt , patent foramen ovale , atrial/ventricular septal defect Participation study investigational device , medication , biologic , agent within 30 day enrollment 30day follow visit Any subject feature opinion investigator preclude study participation
